Constants.Name: AppCloudServices.EnvironmentPassword
Constants.Description: This is the password which is used to communicate with the Mendix AppCloud Services. This password will be set automatically on deployment in the Mendix Cloud.
Constants.DefaultValue: <Password will be generated by the Mendix AppCloud>

Constants.Name: AppCloudServices.EnvironmentUUID
Constants.Description: This is the environment UUID which is used to communicate with the Mendix AppCloud Services to identify this application. This UUID will be set automatically on deployment in the Mendix Cloud.
Constants.DefaultValue: <EnvironmentUUID will be generated by the Mendix AppCloud>

Constants.Name: AppCloudServices.OpenIdEnabled
Constants.Description:
This constant indicates whether Single Sign On through MxID will be performend whenever a user tries to access this app. This constant defaults to 'false' for local deployments and will be set to 'true' automatically upon deployment in the Mendix AppCloud. 

If enabled, the Single Sign On process can be initiated by navigating to "<App URL>/openid/login"

Constants.Name: AppCloudServices.OpenIdProvider
Constants.Description: This constant defines the location of the MxID provider in the AppCloud. This constant will be set by the Mendix AppCloud upon deployment.

Constants.Name: AppCloudServices.PermissionsAPI_Location
Constants.Description: This constant defines the location of the Permissions API provider in the AppCloud. This constant will be set by the Mendix AppCloud upon deployment.

Constants.Name: AppCloudServices.ProfileServiceLocation
Constants.Description:
This constant should refer to the location of the latest profile service version. At the moment, the latest version is: 3
Note that if you previously deployed your app with an older version of the AppCloudServices module, you will need to update the value of this constant in the Cloud Portal.

Constants.Name: CommunityCommons.enableReleaseLockEvent
Constants.Description: If this constant is set to 'true', old locks will be released automatically. Set this constant to 'false' if community commons locking is not used. Use true in all other cases.

Constants.Name: Encryption.EncryptionKey
Constants.Description:
This key will be used to encrypt and decrypt values.
The length of this key must be 16 characters.

Constants.Name: Encryption.EncryptionPrefix
Constants.Description:
Prefix for stored encrypted values.
This value is used to determine whether the value has been already encrypted.

Constants.Name: Encryption.LogNode
Constants.Description: Node which appears in log messages for this module.

Constants.Name: PushNotifications.RegistrationIdCutoff
Constants.Description: Number of characters of the registration ids to write in log messages.

Constants.Name: TinySqlStudio.DisplayCount
Constants.Description: 1ページに表示する件数を指定。デフォルト値は100

ScheduledEvents.Name: CommunityCommons.releaseOldLocks
ScheduledEvents.Description: This event releases locks of expired sessions automatically.

ScheduledEvents.Name: PushNotifications.CheckForUnregisteredDevices
ScheduledEvents.Description: Polls the feedback service of Apple to check if there're any devices which should be unregistered.
